thread.title: Americans in Paris
thread.title_full: Americans in Paris - Review of Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: misself62
title: Americans in Paris
text:
We loved this hotel. The location was perfect for touring the city on foot. Every member of the staff were friendly and greeted us with smiles. The staff did everything in their power to help us make reservations, get cabs and made great suggestions. The hotel is very charming and romantic. The rooms are large and beautifully decorated. The bathroom was large and pretty as well. The bed and pillows were comfortable. The room was absolutely spotless. Each morning they had a sumptuous breakfast which was included in our package. I really can not say enough about how much we loved our time at Hotel Brighton.
Room Tip: They do have rooms that view the Louvre and the Eiffel Tower. I know the view would have been beauti... See more room tips
